column1: '''Il superuomo e i suoi simboli nelle letterature moderne, VI''' (''The Superman and its Symbols in the Modern Literature'') is an Italian-language book.
[[J.R.R. Tolkien]] is treated in the contribution by Carla Giannone: "Il superuomo di Tolkien" ("The Superman of Tolkien"), pp. 139-150.<ref>[[Åke Bertenstam
column2: Bertenstam, Åke]]: ''[http://www.forodrim.org/bibliography/tolklist.html A Chronological Bibliography of Books About Tolkien]''</ref>
